text: Robert Rufus Berryman (February 1902 - July 9, 1969) was an American politician who served in the Alabama House of Representatives from January 1967 until his death in July 1969. ==Life== Berryman was born on February 1902 to William Andrew Berryman and Octavia M. Masterson in Lawrence County, Alabama. He was one of 9 children. On April 6, 1928, he married Kylie Terry. They had one child together. He died on July 9, 1969 at the age of 67. ==References== Category:1902 births Category:1969 deaths Category:Members of the Alabama House of Representatives Category:Alabama Democrats Category:20th- century American politicians Category:People from Lawrence County, Alabama
title: Robert R. Berryman
